program-list.name: program-list
program-list.description: Collect a list of all programs from Vinnova that have been changed or altered since a certain date. The programs are identified by a unique ID, called 'Diarienummer' or 'DiarienummerUtlysning

data.description: The date to start collecting data from. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD, such as 2016-01-01, 2017-02-13.

program-details.name: program-details
program-details.description: Collect detailed information about a specific program from Vinnova given a unique ID

data.description: The unique ID of the program to collect detailed information about. The format of the ID is YYYY-NNNNN, such as 2016-01234, 2017-12345.
